title: Sniff
description: Allows this entity to detect the nearest player within 'sniffing_radius' and update its 'minecraft:suspect_tracking' component state.

cooldown_range.title: Cooldown Range
cooldown_range.description: Cooldown range between sniffs in seconds.

suspicion_radius_horizontal.title: Suspicion Radius Horizontal
suspicion_radius_horizontal.description: Mob suspicion horizontal radius. When a player is within this radius horizontally, the anger level towards that player is increased.

suspicion_radius_vertical.title: Suspicion Radius Vertical
suspicion_radius_vertical.description: Mob suspicion vertical radius. When a player is within this radius vertically, the anger level towards that player is increased.
